mapper.update:
update T_import_SKU
CUSTOM_CODE = #{CUSTOM_CODE},
RECEIVER_ID = #{RECEIVER_ID},
BIZ_TYPE = #{BIZ_TYPE},
APP_TYPE = #{APP_TYPE},
APP_TIME = #{APP_TIME},
APP_STATUS = #{APP_STATUS},
APP_UID = #{APP_UID},
APP_UNAME = #{APP_UNAME},
PRE_NO = #{PRE_NO},
EBP_CODE = #{EBP_CODE},
EBP_NAME = #{EBP_NAME},
EBC_CODE = #{EBC_CODE},
EBC_NAME = #{EBC_NAME},
AGENT_CODE = #{AGENT_CODE},
AGENT_NAME = #{AGENT_NAME},
CLASSIFY_CODE = #{CLASSIFY_CODE},
CLASSIFY_NAME = #{CLASSIFY_NAME},
ITEM_NO = #{ITEM_NO},
ITEM_NAME = #{ITEM_NAME},
G_NO = #{G_NO},
G_CODE = #{G_CODE},
G_NAME = #{G_NAME},
G_MODEL = #{G_MODEL},
BAR_CODE = #{BAR_CODE},
BRAND = #{BRAND},
TAX_RATE = #{TAX_RATE},

UNIT = #{UNIT},
UNIT1 = #{UNIT1},
UNIT2 = #{UNIT2},

COUNTRY = #{COUNTRY},
GIFT_FLAG = #{GIFT_FLAG},

CREAT_TIME = #{CREAT_TIME},
where GUID = #{GUID}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.`GUID`, '') AS MESSAGE_ID, '' AS MESSAGE_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS SEND_ID, IFNULL(t.`RECEIVER_ID`, '') AS RECEIVER_ID, IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS SEND_TIME, IFNULL(t.`VERSION`, '') AS VERSION FROM T_import_SKU t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`APP_UID`, '') AS APP_UID, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'APP_UID' AND c.CODE = t.APP_UID) AS APP_UNAME, IFNULL(t.`CUSTOM_CODE`, '') AS CUSTOM_CODE, IFNULL(t.`BIZ_TYPE`, '') AS BIZ_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`APP_TYPE`, '') AS APP_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`PRE_NO`, '') AS PRE_NO, IFNULL(t.`G_NO`, '') AS G_NO, IFNULL(t.`EBP_CODE`, '') AS EBP_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'EBP_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.EBP_CODE) AS EBP_NAME, IFNULL(t.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS EBC_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'EBC_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.EBC_CODE) AS EBC_NAME, IFNULL(t.`CLASSIFY_CODE`, '') AS CLASSIFY_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'CLASSIFY_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.CLASSIFY_CODE) AS CLASSIFY_NAME, IFNULL(t.`AGENT_CODE`, '') AS AGENT_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'AGENT_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.AGENT_CODE) AS AGENT_NAME, IFNULL(t.`ITEM_NO`, '') AS ITEM_NO, IFNULL(t.`G_NAME`, '') AS G_NAME,
IFNULL(t.`G_CODE`, '') AS G_CODE, IFNULL(t.`G_MODEL`, '') AS G_MODEL, IFNULL(t.`BAR_CODE`, '') AS BAR_CODE, IFNULL(t.`BRAND`, '') AS BRAND, IFNULL(t.`UNIT`, '') AS UNIT, IFNULL(t.`PRICE`, '') AS PRICE, IFNULL(t.`CURRENCY`, '') AS CURRENCY, IFNULL(t.`COUNTRY`, '') AS COUNTRY, IFNULL(t.`GIFT_FLAG`, '') AS GIFT_FLAG, IFNULL(t.`NOTE`, '') AS NOTE FROM T_import_SKU t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}
mapper.update:
update t_import_orders
ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO},
CUSTOM_CODE = #{CUSTOM_CODE},
RECEIVER_ID = #{RECEIVER_ID},
ORDER_TYPE = #{ORDER_TYPE},
APP_TYPE = #{APP_TYPE},
APP_TIME = #{APP_TIME},
APP_STATUS = #{APP_STATUS},
APP_UID = #{APP_UID},
APP_UNAME = #{APP_UNAME},
EBP_CODE = #{EBP_CODE},
EBP_NAME = #{EBP_NAME},
EBC_CODE = #{EBC_CODE},
EBC_NAME = #{EBC_NAME},
AGENT_CODE = #{AGENT_CODE},
AGENT_NAME = #{AGENT_NAME},
GOODS_VALUE = #{GOODS_VALUE},
FREIGHT = #{FREIGHT},
CURRENCY = #{CURRENCY},
TAX_FEE = #{TAX_FEE},
CONSIGNEE_ID = #{CONSIGNEE_ID},
UNDER_THE_SINGER_ID = #{UNDER_THE_SINGER_ID},
LOGISTICS_CODE = #{LOGISTICS_CODE},
LOGISTICS_NAME = #{LOGISTICS_NAME},
LOGISTICS_NO = #{LOGISTICS_NO},
NOTE = #{NOTE},
RETURN_STATUS = #{RETURN_STATUS},
RETURN_TIME = #{RETURN_TIME},
RETURN_INFO = #{RETURN_INFO},
CREAT_TIME = #{CREAT_TIME},
where GUID = #{GUID}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS APP_TIME, IFNULL(t.`PRE_NO`, '') AS PRE_NO, IFNULL(t.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS EBC_CODE, IFNULL(t.`ITEM_NO`, '') AS ITEM_NO FROM T_import_SKU t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`GUID`, '') AS MESSAGE_ID, '' AS MESSAGE_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS SEND_ID,
IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS SEND_TIME, IFNULL(t.`VERSION`, '') AS VERSION FROM t_import_orders t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT
IFNULL(t.`APP_TYPE`, '') AS APP_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`APP_STATUS`, '') AS APP_STATUS, IFNULL(t.`ORDER_TYPE`, '') AS ORDER_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`ORDER_NO`, '') AS PRE_ORDER_NO, IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS APP_TIME,
IFNULL(t.`EBP_CODE`, '') AS EBP_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'EBP_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.EBP_CODE) AS EBP_NAME, IFNULL(t.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS EBC_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'EBC_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.EBC_CODE) AS EBC_NAME,
IFNULL(t.`GOODS_VALUE`, '') AS GOODS_VALUE, IFNULL(t.`TAX_FEE`, '') AS TAX_FEE, IFNULL(t.`FREIGHT`, '') AS FREIGHT, IFNULL(t.`CURRENCY`, '') AS CURRENCY, IFNULL(contact1.`NAME`, '') AS UNDER_THE_SINGER_NAME, IFNULL(contact1.`CODE`, '') AS UNDER_THE_SINGER_CODE, IFNULL(contact1.`ADDRESS`, '') AS UNDER_THE_SINGER_ADDRESS, IFNULL(contact1.`TEL`, '') AS UNDER_THE_SINGER_TELEPHONE, IFNULL(contact1.`COUNTRY`, '') AS UNDER_THE_SINGER_COUNTRY, IFNULL(contact2.`NAME`, '') AS CONSIGNEE, IFNULL(contact2.`CODE`, '') AS CONSIGNEE_CODE, IFNULL(contact2.`ADDRESS`, '') AS CONSIGNEE_ADDRESS, IFNULL(contact2.`TEL`, '') AS CONSIGNEE_TELEPHONE, IFNULL(contact2.`COUNTRY`, '') AS CONSIGNEE_COUNTRY, IFNULL(t.`LOGISTICS_CODE`, '') AS LOGISTICS_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'LOGISTICS_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.LOGISTICS_CODE) AS LOGISTICS_NAME, IFNULL(t.`LOGISTICS_NO`, '') AS LOGISTICS_NO, IFNULL(t.`NOTE`, '') AS NOTE FROM t_import_orders t LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT contact1 ON t.CONSIGNEE_ID = contact1.CONTACT_ID LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT contact2 ON t.UNDER_THE_SINGER_ID = contact2.CONTACT_ID WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}
SELECT IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS APP_TIME, IFNULL(t.`ORDER_NO`, '') AS PRE_ORDER_NO, IFNULL(t.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS EBC_CODE FROM t_import_orders t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`GUID`, '') AS MESSAGE_ID, '' AS MESSAGE_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`PAY_CODE`, '') AS SEND_ID, IFNULL(t.`RECEIVER_ID`, '') AS RECEIVER_ID, IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS SEND_TIME, IFNULL(t.`VERSION`, '') AS VERSION FROM t_import_pay t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`APP_UID`, '') AS APP_UID, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'APP_UID' AND c.CODE = t.APP_UID) AS APP_UNAME, IFNULL(t.`APP_TYPE`, '') AS APP_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`APP_STATUS`, '') AS APP_STATUS, IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS APP_TIME, IFNULL(t.`PAY_CODE`, '') AS PAY_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'PAY' AND c.CODE = t.PAY_CODE) AS PAY_NAME,
IFNULL(t.`PAY_TYPE`, '') AS PAY_TYPE, IFNULL(t.`PAY_NO`, '') AS PAY_NO, IFNULL(t.`ORDER_NO`, '') AS ORDER_NO, IFNULL(t.`EBP_CODE`, '') AS EBP_CODE, (SELECT c.name FROM t_code_name c WHERE c.RELATION_CATEGORY = 'EBP_CODE' AND c.CODE = t.EBP_CODE) AS EBP_NAME, IFNULL(orders.`GOODS_VALUE`+orders.`TAX_FEE`+orders.`FREIGHT`, '') AS CHARGE, IFNULL(orders.`GOODS_VALUE`, '') AS GOODS_VALUE, IFNULL(orders.`TAX_FEE`, '') AS TAX_FEE, IFNULL(orders.`FREIGHT`, '') AS FREIGHT, IFNULL(orders.`CURRENCY`, '') AS CURRENCY, IFNULL(t.`PAY_STATUS`, '') AS PAY_STATUS, IFNULL(contact1.`NAME`, '') AS DRAWEE, IFNULL(contact1.`CODE`, '') AS DRAWEE_INDENTITY, IFNULL(t.`NOTE`, '') AS NOTE FROM t_import_pay t LEFT JOIN T_import_ORDERS orders ON t.ORDER_NO = orders.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT contact1 ON orders.CONSIGNEE_ID = contact1.CONTACT_ID WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

CHARGE = #{CHARGE},

DRAWEE = #{DRAWEE},
DRAWEE_INDENTIFY = #{DRAWEE_INDENTIFY},

mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS APP_TIME, IFNULL(t.`LOGISTICS_NO`, '') AS LOGISTICS_NO, IFNULL(t.`LOGISTICS_CODE`, '') AS LOGISTICS_CODE FROM T_import_LOGISTICS t WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`GUID`, '') AS MESSAGE_ID, '' AS MESSAGE_TYPE, IFNULL(orders.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS SEND_ID, IFNULL(t.`RECEIVER_ID`, '') AS RECEIVER_ID, IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS SEND_TIME, IFNULL(t.`VERSION`, '') AS VERSION FROM T_import_LOGISTICS t LEFT JOIN t_import_orders orders ON t.ORDER_NO = orders.ORDER_NO WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

update T_import_LOGISTICS
ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO},
CUSTOM_CODE = #{CUSTOM_CODE},
RECEIVER_ID = #{RECEIVER_ID},
APP_TYPE = #{APP_TYPE},
APP_TIME = #{APP_TIME},
APP_STATUS = #{APP_STATUS},
APP_UID = #{APP_UID},
APP_UNAME = #{APP_UNAME},
LOGISTICS_CODE = #{LOGISTICS_CODE},
LOGISTICS_NAME = #{LOGISTICS_NAME},
LOGISTICS_NO = #{LOGISTICS_NO},
LOGISTICS_STATUS = #{LOGISTICS_STATUS},
IE_FLAG = #{IE_FLAG},
TRAF_MODE = #{TRAF_MODE},
TRAF_NAME = #{TRAF_NAME},
VOYAGE_NO = #{VOYAGE_NO},
BILL_NO = #{BILL_NO},
FREIGHT = #{FREIGHT},
INSURE_FEE = #{INSURE_FEE},
CURRENCY = #{CURRENCY},
WEIGHT = #{WEIGHT},
NET_WEIGHT = #{NET_WEIGHT},
PACK_NO = #{PACK_NO},
PARCEL_INFO = #{PARCEL_INFO},
GOODS_INFO = #{GOODS_INFO},

SHIPPER_ID = #{SHIPPER_ID},
LOGISTICS_HEAD_NO = #{LOGISTICS_HEAD_NO},

mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.`GNUM`, '') AS GNUM, IFNULL(logistics.`ORDER_NO`, '') AS ORDER_NO, IFNULL(sku.`G_NO`, '') AS G_NO, IFNULL(sku.`ITEM_NO`, '') AS ITEM_NO, IFNULL(sku.`G_CODE`, '') AS G_CODE, IFNULL(sku.`TAX_CODE`, '') AS TAX_CODE, IFNULL(sku.`TAX_RATE`, '') AS TAX_RATE, IFNULL(sku.`G_NAME`, '') AS G_NAME, IFNULL(sku.`G_MODEL`, '') AS G_MODEL, IFNULL(sku.`BAR_CODE`, '') AS BAR_CODE, IFNULL(contact1 .`COUNTRY`, '') AS COUNTRY, IFNULL(sku.`CURRENCY`, '') AS CURRENCY, IFNULL(t.`QTY`, '') AS QTY, IFNULL(t.`QTY1`, '') AS QTY1, IFNULL(t.`QTY2`, '') AS QTY2, IFNULL(t.`UNIT`, '') AS UNIT, IFNULL(t.`UNIT1`, '') AS UNIT1, IFNULL(t.`UNIT2`, '') AS UNIT2, IFNULL(t.`PRICE`, '') AS PRICE, IFNULL(t.`TOTAL`, '') AS TOTAL FROM T_import_INVENTORY_DETAIL t LEFT JOIN t_import_inventory inventory ON inventory.INVENTORY_ID = t.INVENTORY_ID LEFT JOIN t_import_logistics logistics ON logistics.LOGISTICS_NO = inventory.LOGISTICS_NO LEFT JOIN t_import_orders orders ON orders.ORDER_NO = logistics.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN T_CONTACT contact1 ON orders.CONSIGNEE_ID = contact1.CONTACT_ID LEFT JOIN t_import_sku sku ON (sku.ITEM_NO = t.ITEM_NO and orders.ORDER_TYPE = sku.BIZ_TYPE) WHERE t.INVENTORY_ID = #{inventoryId}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`GUID`, '') AS MESSAGE_ID, '' AS MESSAGE_TYPE, IFNULL(orders.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS SEND_ID, IFNULL(t.`RECEIVER_ID`, '') AS RECEIVER_ID, IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS SEND_TIME, IFNULL(t.`VERSION`, '') AS VERSION FROM T_import_INVENTORY t LEFT JOIN T_import_LOGISTICS logistics ON t.LOGISTICS_NO = logistics.LOGISTICS_NO LEFT JOIN t_import_orders orders ON orders.ORDER_NO = logistics.ORDER_NO WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

SELECT IFNULL(t.`APP_TIME`, '') AS APP_TIME, IFNULL(t.`PRE_NO`, '') AS PRE_NO, IFNULL(orders.`EBC_CODE`, '') AS TRADE_CODE FROM T_import_INVENTORY t LEFT JOIN T_import_LOGISTICS logistics ON t.LOGISTICS_NO = logistics.LOGISTICS_NO LEFT JOIN t_import_orders orders ON orders.ORDER_NO = logistics.ORDER_NO WHERE t.`GUID` = #{guid}

where GUID = #{GUID}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(delivery.TRAF_MODE, '') AS TrafMode, IFNULL(delivery.TRAF_NO, '') AS TrafNo, IFNULL(delivery.VOYAGE_NO, '') AS VoyageNo, IFNULL(delivery.BILL_NO, '') AS BillNo, IFNULL(logistics.WEIGHT, '') AS Weight, IFNULL(logistics.PARCEL_INFO, '') AS ParcelInfo, IFNULL(logistics.LOGISTICS_STATUS, '') AS GoodStatus FROM t_import_logistics logistics LEFT JOIN t_import_delivery delivery ON logistics.DELIVERY_NO = delivery.DELIVERY_NO WHERE logistics.LOGISTICS_NO = #{LogisticsNo};
SELECT SUM(QTY) FROM T_IMPORT_ORDER_DETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
